verses.verse: In the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius,<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has been sore <S%H7107>displeased<s%> with your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Therefore <S%H559>say<s%> you to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H7725>Turn<s%> you to me, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> to you, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

Be you not as your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have <S%H7121>cried,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H7725>Turn<s%> you <S%H4994>now<s%> from your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and from your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4611>doings:<s%> but they did not <S%H8085>hear,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7181>listen<s%> to me, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H346>where<s%> are they? and the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> do they <S%H2421>live<s%> for <S%H5769>ever?<s%>

But my <S%H1697>words<s%> and my <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> did they not <S%H5381>take<s%> <S%H5381>hold<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers?<s%> and they <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Like as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H2161>thought<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> to us, according to our <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and according to our <S%H4611>doings,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> has he <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with us.

On the <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H7627>Sebat,<s%> in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius,<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> on a <S%H122>red<s%> <S%H5483>horse,<s%> and he <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H1918>myrtle<s%> trees that were in the <S%H4699>bottom;<s%> and <S%H310>behind<s%> him were there <S%H122>red<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> <S%H8320>speckled,<s%> and <S%H3836>white.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, O my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> are <S%H428>these?<s%> And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me <S%H559>said<s%> to me, I will <S%H7200>show<s%> you <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> be.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H1918>myrtle<s%> trees <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are they <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> to and fro through the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And they <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H1918>myrtle<s%> trees, and <S%H559>said,<s%> We have <S%H1980>walked<s%> to and fro through the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3427>sits<s%> still, and is at <S%H8252>rest.<s%>

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H5704>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you not have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and on the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> against <S%H834>which<s%> you have had <S%H2194>indignation<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> three <S%H7657>score<s%> and ten <S%H8141>years?<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me with <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> and <S%H5150>comfortable<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>

So the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>communed<s%> with me <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H7121>Cry<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> I am <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and for <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7068>jealousy.<s%>

And I am very sore <S%H7107>displeased<s%> with the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that are at <S%H7600>ease:<s%> for I was but a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7107>displeased,<s%> and they <S%H5826>helped<s%> forward the <S%H7451>affliction.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> I am <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%H7356>mercies:<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be <S%H1129>built<s%> in it, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and a <S%H6957>line<s%> shall be <S%H5186>stretched<s%> forth on <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H7121>Cry<s%> <S%H5750>yet,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> My <S%H5892>cities<s%> through <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> be <S%H6327>spread<s%> <S%H6527>abroad;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H5162>comfort<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
Then <S%H5375>lifted<s%> I up my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7161>horns.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me, <S%H4100>What<s%> be <S%H428>these?<s%> And he <S%H559>answered<s%> me, <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H7161>horns<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H2219>scattered<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> me <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2796>carpenters.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> to <S%H6213>do?<s%> And he <S%H559>spoke,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H7161>horns<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H2219>scattered<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> so that <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> did <S%H5375>lift<s%> up his <S%H7218>head:<s%> but <S%H428>these<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2729>fray<s%> them, to <S%H3034>cast<s%> out the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles,<s%> which <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H7161>horn<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H2219>scatter<s%> it.
